page.title: 11A DAY IN JANE COATES' LIFE
page.content: At 7.15 I get up out of my bed. I then get dressed. I then go downstairs have my breakfast go to the bathroom I sit down on the sofa and watch T.V. After watching T.V. I put on my shoes and coat and I leave for school at about 8.30am I then go and find my friends and chatter for about ten minutes we go into assembly Mr. Rice (HEADMASTER) reads out all the notices. Then a class reads. We have a song then we have a hymn practice. Then proper lessons start. 9.30am Maths. 10.30am Break. 10.45am English. 11.50am dinner. 1.20pm art and craft 3.20pm school ends I get home about 4.00pm.
